name.baseName: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site ; Lime ; Agricultural land remediation ; In-situ stabilization
运输到场的材料和设备;石灰;农田土壤;原位稳定化

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process of transporting repair reagents to the site.

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 800kg of lime is transported from the production site to the repair site.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The study site is a paddy field contaminated by Cd, located inGongzhuang town, Huizhou city of the Pearl River Delta, Southern China.
研究地点位于中国南方珠江三角洲惠州市龚庄镇，是一片受镉污染的稻田。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The lime transport distance data is calculated based on the production address of the reagent and remediation site.
基于石灰的生产地址和修复场地的位置来计算修复药剂运输距离数据。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The high-quality lime described in this dataset is intended for use in environmental remediation, specifically for in-situ stabilization of contaminated agricultural land. The primary application is the treatment of Cd-contaminated paddy fields, where it aids in neutralizing soil acidity and immobilizing heavy metals to prevent further environmental degradation and to improve soil health for agricultural productivity.
该数据集中描述的高品质石灰是用于环境修复的，特别是用于受污染农田土壤的原位稳定化。其主要应用是处理Cd污染的稻田，在中和土壤酸度和固定重金属方面起到了作用，以防止环境进一步恶化，同时提高土壤健康，用于农业生产。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Kai L ,Liping F ,Fangbai L , et al. Sustainability assessment and carbon budget of chemical stabilization based multi-objective remediation of Cd contaminated paddy field. The Science of the total environment, 2021, 819 152022-152022.

Kai L ,Liping F ,Fangbai L , et al. Sustainability assessment and carbon budget of chemical stabilization based multi-objective remediation of Cd contaminated paddy field. The Science of the total environment, 2021, 819 152022-152022.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset, users must account for the specific transportation distances of lime from the production address to the remediation site. This is crucial for an accurate life cycle assessment in the context of environmental remediation. Users should also consider the methodological implications of material inputs and outputs, energy use, resource consumption, emissions, and carbon footprint associated with each stage of the process. Additionally, users should take into account local soil conditions and regulatory requirements for the application of lime in agricultural remediation processes.
使用这个数据集时，用户必须考虑从石灰生产地点到修复场地的具体运输距离。这对于环境修复背景下准确的生命周期评估至关重要。用户还应该考虑材料输入与输出、能源使用、资源消耗、排放和与过程每个阶段相关的碳足迹的方法论含义。此外，用户应考虑当地土壤状况及农业修复过程中应用石灰的法规要求。

completeness.common:other: Every stage contains materials, energy, resources, emission, and carbon input and output.
每个阶段都包含材料、能源、资源、排放以及碳的投入和产出。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
